6.case.salesforce.com>

BCC: 
Date: 2025-08-20 17:35
Subject: RE: RSO UAE - STORE Re-Opening - YSL Boutique- Dubai Mall
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All,

 

Kindly be informed that we have Re- Opening of YSL at Dubai Mall” The tentative of the unit handover on 18th Sep and opening date on 20th Sep 2025.

 

To ensure a smooth opening, each stakeholder is required to complete the necessary actions on time. A project checklist been submitted, and you received an email notification.

 

Please ensure to scroll down, click on Edit then update the status of each task. 

 

Regards,

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK	
​​​​	
SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO	
ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

chunks.text:
please share the quotation with Florian for approval and documents with Prathap to apply for permit.

 

@Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>  please support with all insurance certificates. 

 

@Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  please inform TG to start the service on 24th Sep 2025 and provide 1 CC integrated machine.

 

@Ahmed Essa <mailto:Ahmed.Essa@chalhoub.com> To create WH Deliveries in System on 17th Sep maximum to ensure that is reflecting correctly in Siocs. And raise SR for shipments to be delivered on 20th Sep morning.

 

@Roula Saman <mailto:Roula.Saman@chalhoub.com>   please share with Prathap all staff documents who will be doing the stock receiving and VM to apply for the permit.

For any assistance and/or clarifications, feel free to reach me 050-3859997.

Regards,

 

 

 

KAWTTAR NASSIK	
​​​​	
SENIOR ASSOCIATE ‑ RSO

DUBAI
